code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function WeatherDisplay(_ref){let{weather}=_ref;if(!weather)return null;const getTime=timestamp=>{return new Date(timestamp*1000).toLocaleTimeString();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[weather.name,", ",weather.sys.country,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`https://flagcdn.com/w20/${weather.sys.country.toLowerCase()}.png`,alt:`Flag of ${weather.sys.country}`})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-temp",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`https://openweathermap.org/img/wn/${weather.weather[0].icon}@2x.png`,alt:weather.weather[0].description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[Math.round(weather.main.temp),"\xB0C"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Feels like: ",Math.round(weather.main.feels_like),"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:weather.weather[0].description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Humidity: ",weather.main.humidity,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Wind: ",weather.wind.speed," m/s"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Pressure: ",weather.main.pressure," hPa"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Sunrise: ",getTime(weather.sys.sunrise)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Sunset: ",getTime(weather.sys.sunset)]})]})]})]});}export default WeatherDisplay;
